meanings.definition: The act of helping to advance or promote something.
meanings.sent1: In the furtherance of our project, everyone contributed their ideas.
meanings.sent2: The furtherance of education is crucial for a better future.
meanings.sent3: The furtherance of the cake baking contest led to delicious results.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication was the key to the furtherance of the charity's mission.
meanings.sent5: The team worked together in the furtherance of their goal, achieving success.

meanings.definition: The process of making something happen or progress.
meanings.sent1: Through furtherance, the plan was put into action smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The furtherance of technology has revolutionized communication.
meanings.sent3: The furtherance of the dance class made everyone laugh with joy.
meanings.sent4: His determination was the engine driving the furtherance of the construction project.
meanings.sent5: In the furtherance of scientific research, new discoveries are constantly made.
